question: SheSTEM 2024, an initiative of the India-Nordic BEST project, focused on which key area for energy solutions?
According to the India State of Forest Report 2023, by how much has India's forest cover increased since 2021?

India has surpassed $1 trillion in Foreign Direct Investment (FDI) from April 2000 to September 2024. How much of this FDI has been recorded since 2014, reflecting a 119% increase over the previous decade?

Which Union Minister recently unveiled the Anna Chakra, designed to optimize logistics under the Public Distribution System (PDS) and the SCAN Portal, which automates subsidy claim submissions and settlements under the National Food Security Act (NFSA) for faster processing?
Parliament passed the Bharatiya Vayuyan Vidheyak 2024. Which old act does the Bharatiya Vayuyan Vidheyak 2024 replace?
What is the name of India's first indigenous macrolide antibiotic, which aims to address antimicrobial resistance (AMR)?
Which researcher from the Zoological Survey of India (ZSI) is credited with discovering the new species of pangolin, named the Indo-Burmese pangolin (Manis indoburmanica), in Arunachal Pradesh?
Which ministry launched the 'e-student visa' and 'e-student-x visa' for foreign students on January 5, 2025?
options: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship

question: Which department organized the workshop on the National Anubhav Awards Scheme, 2025?
options: Department of Administrative Reforms & Public Grievances

question: Which telecom company has launched the IFTV platform in partnership with Skypro and PlayboxTV for offering over 550 Live TV channels and premium OTT apps in India?
India's first underwater metro tunnel, inaugurated in 2024, is located in which city?
What is the primary objective of the 9th Swachh Survekshan Toolkit and Super Swachh League launched by Union Minister Manohar Lal?
options: Enhance urban cleanliness and innovation among ULBs
Introduce competitions for rural community development
answer: Enhance urban cleanliness and innovation among ULBs

question:
Which of the following statements regarding the Union Cabinet approvals on January 1, 2025 is/are correct?
1. The Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY) and Restructured Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme (RWBCIS) have been extended till 2025-26.
2. The Union Cabinet approved the creation of a Fund for Innovation and Technology (FIAT) with an outlay of Rs. 824.77 crore.
3. The One-time Special Package for Di-Ammonium Phosphate (DAP) will end on 1st March 2025.
Who serves as the convener of the Island Development Agency (IDA), which was constituted by the Home Ministry in 2017 to promote sustainable development of the islands of India?
options: Union Minister of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
Minister of State for Home Affairs

question: Which schemes has the Union Cabinet approved the continuation of until 2025-26 with a ₹69,515.71 crore outlay?
options: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana and Pradhan Mantri Kisan Yojana
Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana and Restructured Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme
National Agricultural Market Scheme and Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi
Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana and National Livelihood Mission
answer: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana and Restructured Weather Based Crop Insurance Scheme

question: What is the age bracket for women eligible for the recently launched Bima Sakhi Yojana?
What is the name of the affordable cafe initiative launched by the Ministry of Civil Aviation at airports and managed by the Airports Authority of India?
Where has the Indian Army launched its Artificial Intelligence Incubation Centre (IAAIIC)?
What is the theme of the 4th National Conference of Chief Secretaries held in New Delhi?
Which country has secured seven key positions in the interim organizational structure of the new Asian body formed by World Boxing, including a board member role for its Boxing Federation President?
Which edition of the Raising Day Parade of the BSF was celebrated in Jodhpur, Rajasthan on 8th December 2024?
Under which scheme did the government provide grants of ₹50 lakh each to two start-ups focusing on sustainable and medical textiles?
What is the name of the nationwide campaign that was launched during the 4th Good Governance Week on 19th December, 2024?
Which organization has partnered with boAt to mentor and support startups in the D2C and manufacturing sectors?
options: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT)
Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME)

question: What is the primary objective of the 'Track and Trace Mechanism' approved by the GST Council in December 2024?
options: To monitor GST rate expansion on certain goods
To simplify GST registration process and to track the GSTIN holder locations
To curb tax evasion in specified commodities
To impose tax at every level
answer: To curb tax evasion in specified commodities

question: India has set up its first diabetes biobank in Chennai. Which two organizations collaborated to set up India's first diabetes biobank?
options: Indian Council of Medical Research and Madras Diabetes Research Foundation
All India Institute of Medical Sciences and Tata Trusts
World Health Organization and All India Institute of Medical Sciences
Indian Medical Association and National Institute of Diabetes
answer: Indian Council of Medical Research and Madras Diabetes Research Foundation

question: Which of the following statements is correct regarding the Kisan Kavach anti-pesticide bodysuit launched by Dr. Jitendra Singh?
options: It is a reusable bodysuit priced at ₹6,000.
It was developed by BRIC-inStem in collaboration with Sepio Health Pvt. Ltd.
The bodysuit uses advanced nanotechnology to neutralize pesticides.
The bodysuit was distributed to all Indian farmers for free at the launch event.
